name: Dismissed Employee
query:
SELECT
  `tabEmployee`.name as "Employee:Link/Employee:100",
  `tabEmployee`.employee_name as "Employee Name::150",
  `tabEmployee`.status as "Status::100",
  `tabEmployee`.date_of_joining as "Joining Date:Date:120",
  `tabEmployee`.relieving_date as "Relieving Date:Date:120"
FROM
  `tabEmployee`
WHERE
`tabEmployee`.status in ("Active")
AND `tabEmployee`.relieving_date <= CURRENT_DATE
